alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Scott (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Morgan and southwestern Scott Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Huntsville, or 12 miles north of Wartburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Helenwood, Sunbright, Elgin, Robbins, Slick Rock and Frozen Head State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
